dict.string: rBUM needs access to your files to perform backups and restores.
rBUM needs access to your Desktop folder if you choose to back it up.
rBUM needs access to your Documents folder if you choose to back it up.
rBUM needs access to your Downloads folder if you choose to back it up.
rBUM needs access to your home directory for backup and restore operations.
rBUM needs access to external drives if you choose to back them up or store backups on them.
